post.body: Don't worry I have plenty of those. My comment was a joke to myself since I am a planner. Thanks.
I may take you up on that one. HA.
Sounds great. You do have some big plans. Time for me to get some sleep. Getting late on east coast.
Just a few marathons and may do another ultra in the fall.
I like it as well if it somewhat warm. The near freezing rain is something else.
Great job on the PR. Then 9 more, super.
Are you going to do it for the shirt?
Thanks for the follow. What races are you planning with the running shoes?
That is hard to grasp.
Good one. I can do that one. HA.
Looks like an interesting place. Thanks for the photos.
I second that. I really loved their natural whole wheat bread.
Very busy day lined up for Monday. Got to plan better in 2009, got to plan better in 2009. Got to remember this as well.
Nice easy and pleasant run this morning. Now how can I ruin this good feeling????
Based on phone call it appears we are running Sunday morning. May be some rain but at least warm for a change.
Off to get a little sleep before our 13 mile run in the morning.
I better check the charts and see if this is low tide vs high tide. What's up Bamma?
"If you can't win, make the person ahead of you break the record."
If you can't see the bright side of life, polish the dull side.
is trying to prevent becoming Roadkill in 2009. Got to run.....
